content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":17201,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ab94cfb7-6715-4327-9782-40d41affe458/15.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ab94cfb7-6715-4327-9782-40d41affe458/15.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"15.PNG\",\"name\":\"15.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ab94cfb7-6715-4327-9782-40d41affe458\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":223.5374077500876},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you ever find that your project is struggling and you need help, the best thing you can do is ask for help. Bring it up to your boss or escalate it up your account leadership. If you need help figuring out who to ask, check out the Network Organizational Structure in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://people.epam.com/network/1/d4baeccc-54e1-4c20-afaf-2bbc811d05ba/structure\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"people.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM aims to establish a culture of humility within the company. Therefore, asking for help is NOT perceived as a mark of incompetence. Asking for help just means you need help. Even senior leadership can be in a position where they need help. So do not be afraid to raise your hand and ask for assistance. Your supervisors are more likely to be upset if you needed help and did not ask for it.   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Partners\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Partner perform the role of capability enabler within BU-GDO-Delivery teams triangle. Knowing which capability, when and how to use it is one of the major benefits the Delivery Partnership possesses. Activities to engage Delivery Partners might differ from case to case. Therefore, we recommend that you get to know who your Delivery Partners are and keep in communication with them for as long as you feel a need for assistance and guidance through-out any stage of the delivery lifecycle. For more information on who Delivery Partners are and what they do, check out this guide: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1376255135\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Partner Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here is how to find your Delivery Partners:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First, go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://projects.epam.com/dashboard/projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"project.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use the left-hand “Structure” menu to navigate to your business unit\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Select your business unit and navigate to the Custom Roles section. Here you will find the names of your units Delivery Partners and the locations they support\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Non-Production Resources\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are several different types of non-production roles that may be utilized on a project. These can include bench managers, account analysts, and operations managers. Non-production resources are not typically common on EPAM projects, however, they become more common and more necessary as accounts grow large and account operations become more complicated.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bench Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a non-production role dedicated to maintaining the resource pool within an account or business unit. Bench managers often aim to keep account specific knowledge within the account. Therefore, when a project ends or downsizes, the bench manger may not release the team, but instead will re-assign them to another project within the account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Account Analyst\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a non-production role that assists account managers with invoicing CRM updates, SOW drafting, time sheets reports and other accounting activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Operations Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a non-production role that manages and maintains account processes that are not directly project related. The specific activities of an operations manager may vary from account to account, often they oversee the staffing and onboarding process. Since the onboarding process can have complicated setups that vary within an account based on the project SOW, the individual role and even the location the team is based, the Operations Managers aims to prevent the onboarding process from becoming a bottleneck that slows down the project. This role can sometime also be handled by a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Administrator\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you think your account may benefit from non-production resources, first discuss it with the account manager. Together, you may need to build aa business case to support your need. Then check out these KB pages on how to add enlist non-production resources:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=915046557\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advertising ORG positions (non-production) - EPAM Opportunities and Rotation - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMUPSAES/Add+Operations+Manager+role+in+delivery+structure\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Add Operations Manager role in delivery structure - Delivery Management and Enterprise Solutions - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Support Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If ever you have a question about EPAM and can’t figure out how to resolve it, the EPAM Support Portal is your solution. The Support team running EPAM’s Support Portal are very knowledgeable and will help to answer your questions. While I don’t recommend creating a new Support Ticket for every problem or question you have, I also won’t save it as a last resort. The Support Team is here to help, and some issues only the support team can resolve. Here are some activities that require a Support Ticket:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request for a Corporate Credit Card\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request for a software license (Miro)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request for EPAM Hardware\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating Guest Wi-Fi accounts\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can create a Support Ticket by going to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://support.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or you can email \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". For more information about creating a Support Ticket, check out this KB: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1635614337\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to use EPAM Support Portal? - EPAM Adaptation - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
